general: Today, Capricorn feels a surge of energy due to the favorable alignment of Saturn and Pluto. It is the perfect time to advance projects that are close to your heart. Stay focused and do not hesitate to take initiatives, as your determination will be rewarded.
love: Express your feelings sincerely to strengthen your bonds.
work: Focus on collaboration, your colleagues will appreciate your leadership.
health: Take time to meditate, it will calm your mind.
advice: Patience and perseverance lead to success.
teaser: A day to shine and move forward!
